pr_title: FAI-214: add the execution ID as a header in the response

timeline.message: FAI-214: add the execution ID as a header in the response

timeline.author: danielezonca

replies.bodyText:
I like this as it would imply no modification to DMNResult implementations required 👍
On other hand this just go to highlight there is no clear strategy for "metadata" handling on Kogito design
replies.author: tarilabs

replies.bodyText: I removed that now...no need for it anymore with the latest changes 👍
replies.author: kostola

timeline.author: danielezonca

replies.bodyText: It was a leftover from previous changes. Fixed now 👍
replies.author: kostola
